item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge bsnyen chen po shes rab brtson 'grus

item.tib: rim pa lnga pa'i dgongs 'grel zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma ma ti TI kA tsan+d+ra pra b+ha nA ma
item.coloph: rim lnga'i dgongs 'grel zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba/ panda ti chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta bi bh'u ti tsandra sa bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: rim lnga'i dgongs 'grel zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba
item.author: paN+Da ti chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa
item.translator-pandita: shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra

item.tib: sgrub thabs mdor byas kyi dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: biN+Di kri ta sA d+ha na pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: sgrubs thabs mdor byas kyi dka' 'grel/ paN+Di ta bi bh'u ti tsandras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis/ dpa' bo'i lo mgo can gyi zla ba'i tshes bcu dgu la rgya dpe la bltas nas/ dpal ri phug gi dben gnas su bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: sgrubs
sgrub thabs mdor byas kyi dka' 'grel
item.author: paN+Di ta bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra
item.translator: shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub
item.translationplace: dpal ri phug gi dben gnas

item.tib: rim pa lnga'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma ar+tha b+hA kar Na nA ma
item.coloph: rim pa lnga'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
item.coltitle: rim pa lnga'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon klu'i byang chub

item.tib: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa
item.skttrans: tsar+ya sa muts+tsha ya pra dI paM nA ma TI kA
item.coloph: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma'i bshad pa shes rab mchog dang ldan pa'i slob dpon shAkya shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma'i bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi bshad pa
item.skttrans: badzra satwa sA d+ha naM b+hA khyA
item.coloph: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs kyi bshad ba/ /slob dpon ta thA ga ta rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //tho lding dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dI pam ka ra rakshi ta dang/ kham pa ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs kyi bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dI paM ka ra rak+Shi ta
item.translator: kham pa ba ri lo tsA ba
item.translationplace: tho lding dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang

item.tib: bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: piN+Di kra ma pany+dzi kA tri pa du
item.coloph: bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//_bal po'i dge bsnyen su'o 'di ta dang dge slong lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel
item.author: slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje
item.translator: dge slong lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab
item.translator-pandita: bal po'i dge bsnyen su'o 'di ta

item.tib: dad pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: shar+d+d+ha pra la nA ma sta ba
item.coloph: dad pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradznyA shrI gupta dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba bande rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: dad pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rdzogs so
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA shrI gup+ta
item.translator: sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang po

item.tib: rim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma pany+tsi kA nA ma
item.coloph: rim pa lnga pa'i dka' ba btus pa'i bshad pa'o/ /slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel/ slob dpon chen po bha bya k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po rgyal ba mchog gi zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: rim pa lnga pa'i dka' ba btus pa'i bshad pa'o
item.author: slob dpon chen po b+ha bya kIrti
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus
item.translationplace: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po rgyal ba mchog

item.tib: rim pa lnga'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma bi pa ra Na
item.coloph: mdor byas pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: mdor byas pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa
item.author: mdor byas pa'i sgrub thabs

item.coloph: rim pa lnga dang rnam par dag pa'i rim pa rnam par bshad pa li la badzra zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ro
item.coltitle: rim pa lnga dang rnam par dag pa'i rim pa rnam par bshad pa li la badzra zhabs kyis mdzad pa
item.author: li la badzra
item.translator-pandita: li la badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma blo gros

item.tib: rim pa lnga pa'i bshad pa nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma TI kA ma Ni mA lA nA ma
item.coloph: rim pa lnga pa'i bshad pa nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: rim pa lnga pa'i bshad pa nor bu'i phreng ba las zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa ste lnga pa'o
item.author: slob dpon klu'i byang chub
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims
item.translationplace: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra

item.tib: rim pa lnga'i dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dam tshig rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po krishna paN+Di ta dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
item.coltitle: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dam tshig rdo rje
item.revisor-pandita: gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta
item.revisor: lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba

item.tib: rim pa lnga'i 'grel pa'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pany+tsa kra ma br-it+tAr+tha bi ro tsa na nA ma
item.coloph: kha che'i mkhas pa chen po dpal lakshm'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel ba rim par gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //yon gyi bdag po dga' rab gza' yis zhus te/ rgya gar gyi mkhas pa paN+Di ta chen po/ tA ra ka la sha'i sras mantra ka la sha nyid kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa rim pa gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba
item.author: kha che'i mkhas pa chen po dpal lak+Sh+mI
item.translator-pandita: tA ra ka la sha'i sras man+t+ra ka la sha

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa man ngag gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: u pa de sha nish+tsa ya nA ma shrI gu h+ya sa ma dzA br-it+ti
item.coloph: le'u bco brgyad pa'i phyed kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs so//_//dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sbas pa'i man ngag tu phyungs pa rnams mdor bsdus pa bstan pa slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon rab tu zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//dam chos zab mo'i tshig las rtogs dka' yang /_/bsam pa bzang po'i sa bon rgyur bzhag nas/_/gang gis gzhan la phan phyir zhus pa yis/_/ci nus bsgyur ba 'di yis lam rnyed shog_/'gro ba'i dpal mgon gyur pa 'jam pa'i dpal/_/kun mkhyen ye shes nyid kyi thugs rje yis/_/kun la skyabs mdzad bka' drin chen po 'di/_/snod dang ldan pa nges par rtogs la byin
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sbas pa'i man ngag tu phyungs pa rnams mdor bsdus pa bstan pa slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon rab tu zhi ba'i ye shes
item.translator: kun mkhyen ye shes

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi man ngag gi rgya mtsho thigs pa
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba'i le'u bco brgyad pa'i phyed kyi tshig dang don rgya cher 'grel cing rnam par bshad pa man ngag gi rgya mtsho thigs pa 'thor bas kyang gzhan dga' ba dang skrag pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon bi shwa na mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//_chos nyid ji bzhin ngang las phyag rgyar sgom byed gnyer yin na/_/gzhan la phan pa bsgrub shes dang ldan slob mas zhus ched du/_/bdag dang slob dpon grogs blos rgyud 'grel sgrub thabs man ngag bcud/_/bsdus nas gsang 'dus tshig don rgyas 'grel rnam bshad chen po bgyis/_/rgyud don gting phyung dkyus gtugs gshegs gsil sgor mtshams 'phel sdud sbyar/_/phyi nang gsang ba mthun pa cha 'phrugs sbas phyung rgol ba bcom/_/rgyu 'bras lta spyod zung 'brel sgrub byed lam gyur gol sa spangs/_/don 'tshol 'bras bu thob 'dod rnams kyi gsal byed sgron ma bas/_/lam 'dir 'jug mos rnams la dgos ched skyon med 'thad bsam yang /_/dus mthar 'gyur blos ma rtogs sgro skur dkyil 'khor gsum la bshags/_/bdag gis 'bad rtsol bskyed pa'i nus mthus sems can ma lus kun/_/sku dang ye shes bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub par shog
item.coltitle: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba'i le'u bco brgyad pa'i phyed kyi tshig dang don rgya cher 'grel cing rnam par bshad pa man ngag gi rgya mtsho thigs pa 'thor bas kyang gzhan dga' ba dang skrag pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon bi shwa na mi tra
item.translator: slob dpon grogs blo

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza tan+t+ra bi ba ra NaM
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon tha ga na'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A ts'arya shraddhA ka ra warmma dang/ dharma shrI bha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande rin chen bzang pos bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa
item.author: slob dpon tha ga na
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra war+m+ma
d+harma shrI b+ha dra
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang po

item.tib: rin po che'i ljon shing zhes bya ba gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: rat+na par+shA nA ma ra ha s+ya sa ma dza br-it+ti
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa chen po rin po che'i ljon shing zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rtsi lu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka mal gupta dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa chen po rin po che'i ljon shing zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po tsi lu pa
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza tan+t+ra pany+tsi kA nA ma
item.coloph: rgyal bas byin pa sman pa'i dus/ /bla ma sangs rgyas bka' drin gyis/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi ni/ /dka' 'grel 'di ni byas pa yin/ /slob dpon rgyal bas byin gyis mdzad pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel las le'u bco brgyad pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po zhi ba bzang po dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa/ /slad kyi lha sa 'phrul snang gtsug lag khang du paN+Di ta ting 'dzin rdo rjes yang zhu chen bgyis nas gtan la phab pa/ slad kyi paN+Di ta chen po shri su na ya mi tra dang/ lo tsA ba chen po dar ma grags kyis kyang bcos pa'o// //
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel las le'u bco brgyad pa'i bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon rgyal ba
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po zhi ba bzang po
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab ye shes
item.translationplace: lha sa 'phrul snang gtsug lag khang
item.revisor-pandita: paN+Di ta chen po shri su na ya mi tra
item.revisor: paN+Di ta ting 'dzin rdo rje
lo tsA ba chen po dar ma grags

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza a laM kA ra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon dri med sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta su na pa shrI mi tra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon dri med sbas pa
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta su na pa shrI mi tra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags

item.tib: le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.coloph: dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon byang phyogs kyi lam la mkhas pa chen po'i zhabs la dran par byas pa/ slob dpon zla ba'i 'od dang ming gzhan rin chen rdo rje'i myu gus mdzad pa/ le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po sun [?]la shrI mi tra dang/ bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags gyis mang yul gyi grong gi lha khang ka/ ru dang/ aag tsar sgang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon byang phyogs kyi lam la mkhas pa chen po'i zhabs la dran par byas pa
item.author: slob dpon zla ba'i 'od dang ming gzhan rin chen rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po su na ya shrI mi tra
item.translator: bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags
item.translationplace: mang yul gyi grong gi lha khang ka ru
ag tsar sgang

item.tib: yang dag rig byed ces bya ba phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: samya gwi d+ya ka ra nA met+ta ra tan+t+ra byA khyA naM
item.coloph: yang dag rig byed ces bya ba rgyud phyi ma'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon bee dya pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //
item.coltitle: yang dag rig byed ces bya ba rgyud phyi ma'i rnam par bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon bai d+ya pA da
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ku su mAny+dza li gu h+ya sa ma dza ni ban+d+ha nA ma
item.coloph: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog ces bya ba slob dpon chen po ratna A kar shAntis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po shAnta bha dra dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.coltitle: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog ces bya ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po rat+na A kar shAn+ti
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po'i bshad pa zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza tan+t+ra rA dzA TI ka tsan+d+ra pra b+hA nA ma
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad pa/ zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rab tu dga' ba'i 'byung gnas go cha'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
item.coltitle: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog

item.tib: rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung
item.skttrans: dwakra ma tat+t+wa b+hA wan nA ma mu khA ga ma
item.coloph: rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal gyi lung/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po lha sangs rgyas dpal gyi ye shes zhabs kyis bsdus pa/ zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal gyi lung
item.author: slob dpon chen po lha sangs rgyas dpal gyi ye shes
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: zhal gyi lung
item.skttrans: mu kha A ga ma
item.coloph: dpal ldan au rgyan yul nas byung ba'i sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba dge slong khyung wer rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: de yis yongs bkrol zhal gyi man ngag go
item.author: sangs rgyas ye shes
item.translator: dge slong khyung wer rin chen bzang po

item.tib: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kun du bzang po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i rdul la reg pa/ slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta shraddhA kar wa rma dang/ lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kun du bzang po zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA kar warma
item.translator: lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po

item.tib: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun du bzang mo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa tu rAM ga sA d+ha nAM no pi ka sa man+ta b+ha drI nA ma
item.coloph: bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun du bzang mo zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dznyA na k'i rtis bsgyur ba'o// //
item.coltitle: bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun du bzang mo zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal ye shes
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: shrI he ru ka sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes

item.tib: dpal he ru ka sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI he ru ka sA d+ha nAM praM t+ti
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rim par phye ba dpal he ru ka'i sgrub @47a */ /pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rim par phye ba dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs

item.tib: grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: muk+ti ti la ka nA ma
item.coloph: grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal ye shes
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: bdag sgrub pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: At+ma sA d+ha nA ba tA ra nA ma
item.coloph: slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa bdag sgrub pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta shAnti bha dra dang/ lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: bdag sgrub pa la 'jug pa
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta shAn+ti b+ha dra
item.translator: lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas

item.tib: rje btsun 'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang gi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: b+haT+TA ra ka AR+Ya dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: rje btsun dzam bha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rje sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddhA ka ra bha dra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /gnod sbyin thams cad dzam bha la bzhin la/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad nor rgyun ma bzhin no zhes gsang ba'i dzam bha la'i sgrub thabs las 'byung ngo/ /kha dog so so las zhal gcig @64b phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yas pa thams cad la b'i dza p'u ra dang/ g.yon thams cad ne'u le'o zhes rgya che ba'i sgrub thabs las gsungs so//
item.coltitle: rje btsun dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rje sangs rgyas ye shes
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra b+ha dra
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: gsang ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: gu h+ya dzaM b+ha la sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ gsang ba'i dzam bha la'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //mkhas pa chen po dza ya se na'i zhal snga nas dang/ btsun pa dharma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: gsang ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes
item.translator: btsun pa d+harma yon tan
item.translationplace: mkhas pa chen po dza ya se na

item.tib: rgya che ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: bista ra dzaM b+ha la sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: rgya che ba'i dzam bha la'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
item.coltitle: rgya che ba'i dzaM b+ha la'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: stang stabs kyi bkod pa
item.coloph: stang stabs kyi bkod pa slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: stang stabs kyi bkod pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ /slob dpon mar me mdzad bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon mar me mdzad bzang po
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: mdzes pa'i me tog ces bya ba rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhal gyi lung gi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: su ku su ma nA ma dwi kra ma ta twa b+ha ba nu kha A ga ma sa da bya pr-it+ti
item.coloph: mdzes pa'i me tog ces bya ba rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ zhal gyi lung gi 'grel ba/ slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: mdzes pa'i me tog ces bya ba rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba/_zhal gyi lung gi 'grel ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po bi ta pA da
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: kun du bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: sa man+ta b+ha dra sA d+ha nAM br-it+ti
item.coloph: kun du bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa byang phyogs kyi dge slong yon tan 'byung gnas bzang po'i slob ma shrI pha la badzra mdzad pa rdzogs so/ / / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po b'i rya bha dra dang/ bi bha ka ra dang/ sgra bsgyur ba'i lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa'o;
item.coltitle: kun du bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa
item.author: byang phyogs kyi dge slong yon tan 'byung gnas bzang po'i slob ma shrI pha la badzra
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bIr+ya b+ha dra
bi b+ha ka ra
item.translator: sgra bsgyur ba'i lo tsA sneb dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: dpal kun du bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI sa man+ta b+ha dra sA d+ha na z-it+t+waM
item.coloph: dpal kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel ba/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tha ga na'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsarya shradda ka ra warma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: dpal kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi 'grel pa
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tha ga na
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar kyi mkhan po A tsar+ya shrad+du ka ra warma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgya cher bshad pa snying po snye ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa tu ra~M` ga sA d+ha naM TI kA sA ra many+dza ra nA ma
item.coloph: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgya cher bshad pa snying po snye ma zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal kun du bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po nya ya na shrI dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bal yul mthil du bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgya cher bshad pa snying po snye ma zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon dpal kun du bzang po
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta chen po n+ya ya na shrI
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab
item.translationplace: bal yul mthil

item.tib: grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: muk+ti ti la ka nA ma byA khyA naM
item.coloph: grol ba'i thig le zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa/ slob dpon chen po ha hi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so;; //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI sa mA dza maN+Dal bi d+hiHTI kA
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'jig rten snang byed ces bya ba sh'o ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po b'i rya bha dra dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'jig rten snang byed ces bya ba shA+o ka bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba

item.tib: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun du bzang mo zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: tsa tu raM ga sA d+ha na no pi ka sa man+ta b+ha dri nA ma TI kA
item.coloph: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kun du bzang mo zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA tas mdzad ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza maN+Da la no pi ka TI kA

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza sA d+ha naM sid+d+hi saM b+ha ba ni d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po bi ta pa'i das mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: sbyor ba bdun pa zhes bya ba dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa
item.skttrans: yo ga sap+ta nA ma tsa tu ra b+hi She ka ra Na
item.coloph: sbyor ba bdun po zhes bya ba dbang bzhi'i rab byed pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
item.coltitle: sbyor ba bdun po zhes bya ba dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa

item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: gtor ma chen po'i cho ga
item.skttrans: ma hA ba liM bi d+hi
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang; bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba//
item.author: slob dpon chen po bi ta pA da
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: mi shigs pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: rat+na ma ti nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: mi shigs pa'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la 'bab pa'o//

item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: bdag gi don grub par byed pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi bya ba'i rim pa
item.skttrans: At+ma ar+tha sid+d+hika ra nA ma yo ga kri ya kra ma
item.coloph: bdag gi don 'grub par byed pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi bya ba'i rim pa slob dpon chen po bi ta pA das mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /

item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan

item.tib: sbyor ba yan lag drug gi snang ba'i rim pa
item.skttrans: Sha Da ng+ga yo gA lo ka kra ma
item.coloph: sbyor ba yan lag drug gi snang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma chen po paN+Dita shri'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong g.yung drung 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: sbyor ba yan lag drug gi snang ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba
item.author: dpal rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong g.yung drung 'od
item.translationplace: bla ma chen po paN+Di ta shri
bod yul

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza s+ya many+dzu shrI sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa'i gsang ba 'dus ba'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal kun du bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bod yul du bod ris kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po khri mgon btsan gyis yon bdag byas nas/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti k'i rtis bsgyur nas gtan la phab ba'o//
item.coltitle: gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal kun du bzang po
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kI rti
item.sponsor: bod ris kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po khri mgon btsan

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: shrI sa mA dza a b+hi sa ma ya nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par @115b rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddhA ka ra wa rma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te slad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// //

item.skttrans: maN+Dal bi d+hi

item.author: slob dpon bsod snyoms pa

item.tib: dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pri ya sA d+ha naM nA ma

item.tib: dpal mi bskyod rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: shrI a k+Sho b+h+ya badzra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal ldan mi bskyod rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs; slob dpon dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rtogs sla zhing mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: saM k+Shi p+ta su bo d+haM shrI sa mA dza sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dus shing rtogs sla ba'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ dpal mkhas pa chen po su na ya shrI mi tra paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //
item.coltitle: 'dus shing rtogs sla ba'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs
item.author: dpal mkhas pa chen po su na ya shrI mi tra paN+Di ta
item.translator-pandita: dpal mkhas pa chen po su na ya shrI mi tra paN+Di ta
item.translator: lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar

item.tib: dbang gi rab tu byed pa
item.skttrans: a b+hi She ka pra kri yaM
item.coloph: mdor bsdus pa'i dbang gi rab tu byed pa/ /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //gzhung tshad ni tshigs bcad sum brgya ste bam po gcig go/ /tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du rje mnga' bdag btsan po rtse lde btsan gyi bka' lung gis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan bo mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: mdor bsdus pa'i dbang gi rab tu byed pa
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal dga' ba'i rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri
item.translationplace: rje mnga' bdag btsan po rtse lde btsan
tho ling gi gtsug lag khang

item.tib: 'dus pa'i dbang bskur ba mdor bsdus pa
item.skttrans: saM k+Ship+tA b+hi She ka gu h+ya sA mA dzi ka
item.coloph: gsang ba 'dus pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so// //'di ni paN+Di ta ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa/ bal po'i paN+Di ta su ma ti k'i ti'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyi zhal snga nas dang/ mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //
item.coltitle: gsang ba 'dus pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa
item.author: paN+Di ta ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa
item.translator-pandita: mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug
item.translationplace: bal po'i paN+Di ta su ma ti kI ti
bod kyi lo tsA ba klog skya gzhon nu 'bar

item.tib: yan lag bdun pa
item.skttrans: sap+ta ang+ga
item.coloph: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi bshad pa rdzogs so// //gzhung 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ /legs par rnam par brtsi byas nas/ /brgya phrag rnam pa bzhi dag dang/ /nyi shu rtsa lngar yang dag ldan/ /slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa'i yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i bzhi pa rdzogs so;; //lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi dpe las zhu gtugs g.yar khral 'tshal ba lags so//
item.coltitle: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i bzhi pa
item.author: slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa
item.translator-pandita: lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas

item.tib: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba
item.skttrans: tat+t+wA rat+na A lo ka
item.coloph: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba
item.author: slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa

item.tib: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: tat+t+wA rat+na A lo ka byA khyA na
item.coloph: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba'i rnam par bshad pa/ slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi dpe las zhu gtugs g.yar khral 'tshal ba lags so//
item.coltitle: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba'i rnam par bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa
item.translator-pandita: lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas

item.tib: rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: su biSh+Ti sA d+ha no pa yi ka
item.coloph: rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpe med pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po b'irya bha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon dpe med pa'i rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po bIr+ya b+ha dra
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI sa mA dza lo ke shwa ra sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rim pas bsgrubs pa; /slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pam kA ra shrI dznyA na dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rim pas bsgrubs pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+yA wa lo ka te shwa ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'jig rten mgon po sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: 'jig rten mgon po sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: shrI guh+ya sa mA dza sto tra
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bstod pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad ye shes
item.translator-pandita: slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad ye shes
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: de kho na nyid bcu pa
item.skttrans: da sha ta t+t+wA
item.coloph: de kho na nyid bcu pa slob dpon rgyan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: de kho na nyid bcu pa
item.author: slob dpon rgyan pa
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong dar ma grags

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: pra tiSh+Tha bid+hiH
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon zla ba'i 'od kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pun+ya k'irti dang/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod nams rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.author: slob dpon zla ba'i 'od
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po puN+ya kIrti
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod nams rgyal ba

item.tib: bstan pa'i nor thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: sA sa na sarba ka sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: di rnams ji ltar gyur pa'i cho ga rnam par phye ba yin/ /'di ni bstan pa'i nor thams cad pa ste/ paN+Di ta chen po ratna k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ratna k'i rti dang/ lo tsA ba chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur/
item.coltitle: 'di ni bstan pa'i nor thams cad pa ste
item.author: paN+Di ta chen po rat+na kIrti
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta rat+na kI rti
item.translator: lo tsA ba chings yon tan 'bar

item.tib: khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga
item.skttrans: da sa kro d+ha ba liM bi d+hiH
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //

dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed pa ni de ltar bstan pa yin no/ /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bsod snyoms pa dge slong 'od srungs gzhon nu'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi @286b mkhan po ta thA ga ta rakshi ta dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bandhve rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed pa ni de ltar bstan pa
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bsod snyoms pa dge slong 'od srungs gzhon nu
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he rin chen bzang po

item.tib: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: Sha Ta saM ga yo ga nA ma TI kA
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi lugs paN+Di ta smri tis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.author: paN+Di ta smr-i ti

item.tib: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Sha Da saM ga yo ga nA ma
item.coloph: ye shes zhabs lugs kyi sbyor ba yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: ye shes zhabs lugs kyi sbyor ba yan lag drug pa

item.tib: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: many+dzu badzra pU dza bi d+hiH
item.coloph: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //shAkya'i dge slong blo gros seng ges zhu chen byas nas paN+Di ta chen po bi bh'u ti tsandras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //ye dharmA he tu pra bha wA he tunte shAnta thA ga to hya wad ta/ te shAnytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam bA dI ma hA shra ma na:/ /
item.coltitle: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod pa'i cho ga
item.author: slob dpon dpal sbyin
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra
item.revisor: shAkya'i dge slong blo gros seng ge

item.tib: ar+g+ha'i cho ga
item.skttrans: ar+g+ha bi d+hi
item.coloph: aargha'i cho ga snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba rendra ba'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong pradznyA k'irtis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: ar+g+ha'i cho ga snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon snang byed zla ba
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti
item.translationplace: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba ren+d+ra ba

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba rendra pa'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong pradznyA k'i rtis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon snang byed zla ba
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti
item.translationplace: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba ren+d+ra pa

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: paN+Di ta mi 'jigs pa'i phyag gis mdzad pa/ /rab gnas kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: rab gnas kyi cho ga mdor bsdus pa
item.author: paN+Di ta mi 'jigs pa'i phyag

item.tib: rgya che ba'i tshig bsdus pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: bi Sha da pa da saM gra ho nA ma pra tiSh+ThA bi d+hi
item.coloph: ces pa rgya che ba'i tshig bsdus pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal kA tsa zhabs kyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so//_'di bod kyi skad du/_dri ma med pa'i mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug_/chos kyi rje chen po rgyal dbang sprul sku rin po che'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' bzhin/_zha lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dras/_/sa skyong dam pa dpon chen kun dga' bsod nams rin chen dbang gi rgyal po'i bdag rkyen las/_/bden gnas dpal e waM chos 'khor du bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: ces pa rgya che ba'i tshig bsdus pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.author: slob dpon dpal kA tsa zhabs
item.translator: zha lu lo tsA ba dge slong d+harma pA la b+ha dra
item.translationplace: chos kyi rje chen po rgyal dbang sprul sku rin po che
bden gnas dpal e waM chos 'khor
item.sponsor: sa skyong dam pa dpon chen kun dga' bsod nams rin chen dbang gi rgyal po

item.tib: dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su spyang ba'i rgyud las phyung ba spyan ma'i ngan song sbyong pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: shrI sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na tan+t+rA ta ud D+hit+ya lo tsa nA yA durga ti sho d+ha na bi d+hiH
item.coloph: shi ba bde 'gror sbyar ba'i cho ga shin tu 'dod pa mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ming can dpal stong nyid ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa ba dh'u t'i bee ro tsa na badzra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba khams ba ldi ri chos kyi grags pas bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: shi ba bde 'gror sbyar ba'i cho ga shin tu 'dod pa mchog tu gyur pa
item.author: ming can dpal stong nyid ting nge 'dzin rdo rje
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba khams ba ldi ri chos kyi grags pa
item.translationplace: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a bad+hU tI bai ro tsa na badzra

item.tib: tha ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: an+ta ma ha bi d+hi
item.coloph: tha ma'i cho ga'i ming gi rnam grangs gshin po bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas la 'god pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta dpal ting nge 'dzin rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal phyogs dbang dga' byed kyi zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong pradznyA k'irtis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: tha ma'i cho ga'i ming gi rnam grangs gshin po bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas la 'god pa zhes bya ba
item.author: paN+Di ta dpal ting nge 'dzin rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti
item.translationplace: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal phyogs dbang dga' byed

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: tan+t+ra rA je shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza TI kA
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dgongs pa thams cad nye bar len pa'i 'grel ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dznyA na garbha dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//
item.coltitle: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dgongs pa thams cad nye bar len pa'i 'grel pa
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bla ma'i man ngag gis bshad pa
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza tan+t+ra ni dA na gu rU pa de she nA khya ta
item.coloph: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.author: slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje

item.tib: dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rdo rje sems bsgrub phyir bris te/ /rdo rje bzhad pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /sems can ye shes bskyed phyir ro/ /dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: dpal bde ba chen po sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA su kha sA d+ha no pi ka bya khya na
item.coloph: dpal bde ba chen po'i 'grel pa slob dpon chen po bi mA la garbhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: dpal bde ba chen po'i 'grel pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po bi mA la gar+b+ha

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: shrI sa ha dza sa mA dza sA d+ha nA ma
item.coloph: gsang chen lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon rdo rje sgeg pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po buddha shrI dznyA na dang/ lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
item.coltitle: gsang chen lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon rdo rje sgeg pa
item.translator: lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal
item.translator-pandita: kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa ma dza tan+t+ra rA dza br-it+ti
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa bla ma'i man ngag nyid las bris pa dam pa rnams kyi spyi bos blangs pa paN+Di ta chen po smri ti dznyAn k'i rtis mdzad cing paN+Di ta de nyid kyis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
item.coltitle: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa bla ma'i man ngag nyid las bris pa dam pa rnams kyi spyi bos blangs pa
item.author: paN+Di ta chen po smri ti dz+nyAn kI rti
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta chen po smri ti dz+nyAn kI rti

item.tib: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa tur de ba ti pa ri pr-iMts+tsha byA khya naM u pa de sha bauSh+Ta kaNA ma
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon smri ti dznyA na k'i rtis mdzad pa lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje smri ti dzanyA na k'i rti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rti
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: tsa tur de ba ti pa ri pr-i ts+tsha TI kA
item.coloph: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bshad pa slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dran pa ye shes grags pas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon ye shes snying po
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dran pa ye shes grags pa

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shrI bha dra dang/ zhu chen lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur te/ slad nas A tsA rya shraddha ka ra war mas zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
item.coltitle: thugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shrI b+ha dra
item.translator: zhu chen lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po
item.revisor-pandita: A tsA r+ya shrad+d+ha ka ra war ma

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI ya mA ri tan+h+ra pany+dzi ka sa ha dzA lo ka nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon shrI dha ras mdzad pa las rim par phye ba bco brgyad pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po shAnti bha dra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur te zhus nas gtan la phab pa// //
item.coltitle: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon shrI d+ha ra
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba

item.tib: dpal gshin rje dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza pany+tsi ka rat+na pra dI pa nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje'i dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po ratnA ka ra shanti sa nyung bar sbyar ba 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //aA ts'arya bi na ya tsandra dang/ /lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis dad pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
item.coltitle: dpal gshin rje'i dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rat+nA ka ra shan+ti
item.translator-pandita: A tsAr+ya bi na ya tsan+d+ra
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon par mthong ba lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri tan+t+ra rA dza pra ka na phra dI pa nA ma TI kA
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa mngon par mthong ba lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po krishna pa chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa mngon par mthong ba lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po kr-iSh+Na pa chen po
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri tan+t+ra s+ya pany+tsi ka rat+na a ba li nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon gzhon nu zla ba

item.tib: gshin rje dgra nag po'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya ma ri tan+t+ra pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: gshin rje nag po'i rnam 'grel ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pad+ma pA nis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon par me shva ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
item.coltitle: gshin rje nag po'i rnam 'grel ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon pad+ma pA Ni
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi slob dpon par me shwa ra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba rong zom chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Ta ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: tshig gi snang ba grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta dA na k'i rti dang/ lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur// //
item.coltitle: tshig gi snang ba grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon dpal 'dzin
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta dA na kIrti
item.translator: lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal ba

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+na ya mA ri maN+Da la no pi ka
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na k'i rti dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na kI rti
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba

item.tib: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: badzra sa ra swa tI sto tra
item.coloph: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta su ma ti k'i rti dang/ lo tsA ba mar do chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa
item.author: slob dpon dpal 'dzin
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta su ma ti kI rti
item.translator: lo tsA ba mar do chos kyi dbang phyug

item.tib: gshin rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ya mA ri maN+Dal no pi ka ya mAn+ta ko da ya nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po la li ta badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa mo gha badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon chen po la li ta badzra
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba cog gru shes rab bla ma

item.tib: mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta tsin+ti ti ka
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po la li ta badzra

item.tib: srung ba'i 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: rak+Sha sA d+ha no pi ka
item.coloph: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.author: dpal mar me mdzad bzang po

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis/ /rgya gar gyi dpe phyi mo dang gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o/
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon nyin mor byed pa'i grags pa
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Ta ya mA ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gshin rje'i dgra nag po sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon gho sha badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i mkhan po su ma ti tsandra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bande tshogs chag chung bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: gshin rje'i dgra nag po sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon g+ho Sha badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de tshogs chag chung ba
item.translationplace: bal po'i mkhan po su ma ti tsan+d+ra

item.tib: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs/ 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa
item.skttrans: shrI kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM/sa tsakra ar+tha bista ra byA khyA
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa slob dpon mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A ts'arya bi nA ya tsandra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa
item.author: slob dpon mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya bi nA ya tsan+d+ra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: gshin rje'i gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa las/ mkhas pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pas/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa ka ma la ra kshi tra zhes bya bas bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI pam ka ra shrI dznyA na dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa
item.author: dge slong bsod snyoms pa ka ma la rak+Shi ta
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba

item.tib: maN+Dal gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: maN+Dal bi d+hiH
item.coloph: aom badzra mandala la mu: zhes bya ba ni mandala gnyis gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /yi dam lha'i mandala ni so so'i sgrub thabs kyi gzhung las shes par bya'o/ /slob dpon chen po dpal rnyog med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa du la dha sa dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: yi dam lha'i maN+Dal ni so so'i sgrub thabs kyi gzhung las shes par bya'o
item.author: slob dpon chen po dpal rnyog med rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a du la d+ha sa
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab

item.tib: maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: dngos kyi mandala rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la rakshi tas/ gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa la brten nas mandala gyi cho ga mdzad pa'o// //lo tsA ba shrI pra dznyA na k'i rtis bsgyur pa'o//
item.coltitle: maN+Dal gyi cho ga
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la rak+Shi ta
item.translator-pandita: lo tsA ba shrI pradz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs ku mu da kha bye ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na la nA ri sA d+ha na pro ta phul la ku mu dA nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ku mu da kha bye ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //aA ts'arya bi na tsandra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: ku mu da kha bye ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba
item.translator-pandita: A tsAr+ya bi na tsan+d+ra
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma

item.tib: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed nag po dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri kro d+ha rA dza ba tra sa ra sA d+ha naM nA ma

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so
item.coltitle: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: bai ro tsa na ya mA ri no pi ka nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon rtogs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas par grags pa/ dpa' mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon rtogs zhes bya ba
item.author: dpal mar me mdzad
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA shrIj+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: rat+na saM b+hA wa ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: a mi tA b+hA hr-i da ya rA ga ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed kyi sgrubs thabs zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon mar me mdzad

item.tib: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: badzra tI k+Sh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: rdo rje sems ma bde ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra tsartsi kA sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje sems ma bde ba bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: rdo rje sems ma bde ba bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po mar me mdzad
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra DA ki yo gi ni sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon mar me mdzad

item.tib: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra gI ti su kha ra da sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyang can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: las kyi rdo rje gau rI'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: karma badzra Ni gau rI sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje goo r'i'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: rdo rje gau rI'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: b+haT+TA ka many+dzu shrI ya mA ri pU dza kra ma bid+hi nA ma
item.coloph: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po krishna paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
item.coltitle: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta

item.tib: sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri bud+d+ha sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: sangs rgyas gshen rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ nA da ku be ra las byung ba'i don/ kun da nakshe ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA sh'i dznyA na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: kun da nak+She ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs
item.author: rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rak+Shi ta
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: mung+ga ra kro d+ha ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyis grub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyis grub thabs zhes bya ba
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po mar me mdzad

item.tib: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: daN+Da d+h+r-ika bi dA ra ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dI pam ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po dI paM ka ra
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tsaN+Da khaD+ga ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: pad+ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pradz+nyA su kha ya pad+ma ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: pad+ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pam ka ra zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pra dznyA shrI dznyA na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
item.coltitle: pad+ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kriSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi mandala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //zangs gling rnal 'byor nA ga p'u ra yis/ /rnal 'byor ka ma rakshi ta nyid la/ /gu tsha rgyal bu'i bu nyid btang nas kyang/ /ta ru pa ri dur khrod tshal nyid du/ /rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo nang/ /gsol btab rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhal ngo ru/ /mandala cho ga bsod snyoms pa yis byas/ /deng sang rnal 'byor lta spyod ldan pa yis/ /dus rnams rtag tu mandala 'bad par rigs//
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi maN+Dal gyi cho ga
item.translator-pandita: bsod snyoms pa

item.tib: chos kyi sku'i snang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: d+harma kA ya kI paM bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka lA pa ma hA zhes bya bas mdzad pa mchod rten gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor bsod snyoms pa pradznyA shrI dznyA nas rang 'gyur du byas pa'o/ /som pu ri'i gtsug lag khang chen du/ /nag po zhabs zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rnal 'byor tshe 'phos de ba pA la yis/ /yab mchog dharma pA la 'das gyur pa'i/ /ched du gsol btab rgyal po'i zhal ngo ru/ /mchod rten cho ga me tog tshal du mdzad/ /spros bcas spros med tshul gyi lam mchog 'di/ /deng sang rnal 'byor rnams kyis gdab par rigs//
item.coltitle: mchod rten gyi cho ga
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka lA pa ma hA zhes bya ba
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi ro sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: hom bi d+hiSh+Ti sha kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi ro sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed kyi ro sreg gi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon nag po zhabs

item.tib: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ga Na tsakra di d+hI nA ma
item.coloph: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa
item.author: slob dpon nag po zhabs

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri shAn+ti hom bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so
item.coltitle: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa bsod nams pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kI rti
item.translationplace: dpal mchog rdo rje gdan

item.tib: yi dgas thams cad rdo rjes bcings pa
item.skttrans: sarba pre ta badzra pA sha ka
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa nas phyung ba
item.author: slob dpon nag po zhabs
item.translator-pandita: rnal 'byor pa pra dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri ya b+hi sa ma ya kra ma
item.coloph: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed khro bo chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal rdo rje'i blos mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed khro bo chen po'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal rdo rje'i blo

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga
item.coltitle: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga

item.tib: gshin rje dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs/_slob dpon kun du bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon kun du bzang po
item.translator: slob dpon don yod rdo rje

item.tib: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: ya mA ri sA d+ha na
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'gro bzangs snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pa ka ra shrI dznyA na dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// `/ /
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon 'gro bzangs snying po
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon la li ta badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon la li ta badzra

item.tib: 'o ma sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: k+Shi ra sA d+ha na
item.coloph: dpal krishna ya mA ri'i rgyud las/ 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag tu byas la/ A tsarya dzi mu da bA tA las mdzad pa/ 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //aA ts'arya badzra pA ni dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ `/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i man ngag bzhugs//
item.coltitle: 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag
item.author: A tsar+ya dzi mu da bA tA la
item.translator-pandita: A tsAr+ya badzra pA Ni
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo'i man ngag
item.coloph: gshed nag 'khor lo'i man ngag /slob dpon chen po nA ga bo dhis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur/ `/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs/
item.coltitle: gshed nag 'khor lo'i man ngag
item.author: slob dpon chen po nA ga bo d+hi
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab

item.tib: sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.coloph: sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon chen po la li ta badzra

item.tib: 'chi bdag yi dwags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: chi bdag yi dags rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: 'chi bdag yi dgas rgyal po'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: lag pa'i mchod pa
item.coloph: lag pa'i mchod pa dA na sh'i las bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: lag pa'i mchod pa
item.translator-pandita: dA na shI la

item.tib: gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri maN+Dal stu te nA ma
item.coloph: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi dgongs pa nye bar bsdus pa las/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa/ A ts'arya k'i rti'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi dgongs pa nye bar bsdus pa las/_/gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa
item.author: A tsAr+ya kI rti

item.tib: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: ya mA ri tu no tan+ta badzra d+h+r-ika
item.coloph: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa le'u'i rgyud las bstod pa'i le'u'o/ /rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa le'u'i rgyud las bstod pa'i le'u'o

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+ha ra ba tan+t+ra TI kA
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel/ /rdo rje slob dpon mi bskyod pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsandra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.author: rdo rje slob dpon mi bskyod pa
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi nA ya tsan+d+ra
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra ba tan+Ta pa ne ka ra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi mdor bshad pa/ slob dpon so na shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta'i zhal nas brgyud pa'o/
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi mdor bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon so na shrI
item.translator-pandita: mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud kyi mdo mdor bshad pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra ba tan+t+ra sU tra bi nA ma
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnal 'byor gyi skabs mdo mdor bshad pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi rjes su 'brangs ba'i slob dpon dpal chen po rdo rje grub pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnal 'byor gyi skabs mdo mdor bshad pa
item.translator: slob dpon dpal chen po rdo rje grub pa

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra ba tan+t+ra pany+tsi kA
item.coloph: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud chen po'i dka' 'grel rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rakshi ta dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong ba rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud chen po'i dka' 'grel
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal gzhon nu zla ba
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri rin chen grags pa

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi 'grel pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra wa tan+t+ra pany+tsi kA rat+na mA lA nA ma
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi 'grel pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po nag po pa nyid kyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid las blangs nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud kyi 'grel pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po nag po pa
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po paN+Di ta dpal bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros

item.tib: ma he'i zhal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: ma hiR+ShA nan ya sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnam par snang mdzad srung ba'i zhabs dang/ lo tsA ba khams pa dge slong ba ri dharmA k'irtis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud kyi sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon dpal 'dzin
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnam par snang mdzad srung ba'i zhabs
item.translator: lo tsA ba khams pa dge slong ba ri d+harmA kIrti

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra wa e kA na na dwi b+hu dza sA d+ha nA ma
item.coloph: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rab mdzad pa/ /phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsarya aa nanta dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: 'jam pa'i dbyangs
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya a nan+ta
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rdo rje grags

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa
item.skttrans: shrI badzra b+hai ra ba sA d+ha na no pi ka saM k+Ship+ta
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon chen po shrI bha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po shrI b+ha dra

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/_/rdzogs so
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga

item.tib: sgrub pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: sgrub pa'i cho ga slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: sgrub pa'i cho ga
item.author: slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor ba'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor ba'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa/ slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa las 'khor lo bskor ba'i las drag po phyogs gcig pa
item.author: slob dpon zhi ba'i ye shes

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra wa sA d+ha na
