item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba

item.tib: 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i byang chub chen po'i sku gdung gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: many+dzu shrI nA ma sang+gI ti bo d+hi ma hA sha rI raM bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i tsha tsha'i cho ga rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sang+gI ti ho ma bi d+hi saM gra ha ta nA ma
item.coloph: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te @30b gtan la phab pa'o/
item.coltitle: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul gyi spyod pa bsdus pa las/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa
item.author: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: mnyam par bzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: 'jam dpal dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi sU tra pi tri tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo don mdor bsgyur pa'i cho ga sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong las rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u yi sgrub thabs mdo dang bsras pa/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa
item.author: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyan dbye ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti tsak+Shu bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags byad kyi 'khor los gsad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti tsakra ma ra mA ra ya man+t+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags kyi byad kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags kyi byad kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sdigba sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha na bi d+hi maN+Da la nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag pr brjod pa'i tshe 'phos pa la phan pa'i bdun tshigs kyi cho ga /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i tshe 'phos pa la phan pa'i bdun tshigs kyi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sdig pa sbyong ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi ho ma pA baM sho d+ha ya nA ma
item.coloph: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: 'jam dpal gyi ro sreg pa'i cho ga
item.author: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: ngan song sbyong ba 'gro ba rigs drug gi cho ga
item.coloph: tshe las 'das pa'i sgrib pa sbyong ba'i cho ga 'gro ba rigs drug nas 'don pa dang /_dkyil 'khor drug tu gzhug cing dbang bskur ba dang /_lam bstan cing smon lam gdab pa/_slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: tshe las 'das pa'i sgrib pa sbyong ba'i cho ga 'gro ba rigs drug nas 'don pa dang /_dkyil 'khor drug tu gzhug cing dbang bskur ba dang /_lam bstan cing smon lam gdab pa
item.author: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa don bcu gnyis bstan pa
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsi t+ta b+hA ba ar+tha dwa da sha nir de sha
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa don bcu gnyis bstan pa lung gi rjes su 'brangs pa'i sing ga gling gi slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i tshigs bcad bzhi bcu pa rdzogs so// //
item.coltitle: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa don bcu gnyis bstan pa
item.author: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti no pi ka
item.coloph: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub thabs/_slob dpon chen po dpal ldan byang chub mchog gis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po dpal ldan byang chub
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bklag pa'i bsgom khog pa zhugs
item.coloph: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bklag pa'i bsgom khog /slob dpon dpal ldan byang chub mchog gis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bklag pa'i bsgom khog
item.author: slob dpon dpal ldan byang chub

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi rim pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti nA ma ho ma kra ma
item.coloph: rim pa gnyis kyis phye ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon chen po rin po che'i gling na gnas pa dpal ldan byang chub @83a */ /mchog gis mdzad pa/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dznyA na k'i rtis bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: rim pa gnyis kyis phye ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rgyas pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po rin po che'i gling na gnas pa dpal ldan byang chub
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI maN+Da la gu Na saM b+ha ba bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi skal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ gzhan yang skye ba gcig la mtshan lnga thob pa'i slob dpon de'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dznyA na k'i rtis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //phyis slob dpon 'phags pa mchog gis kyang zhus nas gtan la phab ste 'gyur phyi ma yang yin no//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon dpal ldan byang chub
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: A R+Ya many+dzu shrI pra ti ShaTha bi d+hiH
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'di/ /bdag gis rang bzor @107b byas min te/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las 'ongs/ /kun gyis 'jam dbyangs thob par shog/ /slob dpon shAntim garbhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.author: slob dpon shAn+tiM gar+b+ha

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: AR+Ya many+dzu shrI nA ma aM ga'i ti gu h+ya bAn+no po ka dz+nyA na dI pa nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i @150b 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dznyA na k'i rtis mdzad cing de nyid kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: thig gdab pa'i rim pa
item.coloph: sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i thig gi cho ga_/paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i thig gi cho ga
item.author: paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: spyan dbye ba'i cho ga
item.skttrans: ne trod+g+ha Ta bi d+hiH
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga panda ti smra tis bsgrigs nas sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga
item.translator-pandita: paN+Da Ti smra ti

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sA d+ha nA ma
item.coloph: dge bsnyen ma snyan grags dge mas mdzad pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: dge bsnyen ma snyan grags dge ma

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i cho ga
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI rat+na no bi ka
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i sgrub thabs/ /dge bsnyen ma grags sbyin mas mdzad pa/ / smri ti dznyA na k'i rtis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i sgrub thabs
item.author: dge bsnyen ma grags sbyin ma
item.translator-pandita: smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ho d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha nA ma
item.coloph: di ni dril bu'i mtshan nyid do/ /nam mkha' dri med dkyil 'khor legs bris pa'i/ /rnam par dkar ba'i dge ba gang yin des/ /'gro kun lta ngan sprin tshogs rnams bsal te/ /phyogs rnams kun du nyi zla ltar gyur cig /

item.tib: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI many+dzu badzra u da ya maN+Da lo bi bye sarba satwa hi ta ba ha nA gam
item.coloph: sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //
item.coltitle: sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi cho ga

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa
item.coloph: 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.author: 'jam dpal bshes gnyen

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi sU tra pin+t+ra ti
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las/ rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las/_rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa
item.author: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen

item.tib: gsang ldan gyi dka' 'grel don bsdus sgron ma
item.coloph: gsang ba'i dka' 'grel bshad pa don bsdus sgron ma rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de bA ka ra tsandra dang; lo tsa ba klog skyas bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: gsang ba'i dka' 'grel bshad pa don bsdus sgron ma
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po de bA ka ra tsan+d+ra
item.translator-pandita: lo tsa ba klog skya

item.tib: gsang ldan gyi tho yig
item.coloph: gsang ldan ma'i tho yig pundartha byas pa smri ti dznyA na k'irti sa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /
item.coltitle: gsang ldan ma'i tho yig puN+Dar+tha byas pa
item.author: smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sing+gI ti maN+Dal bi d+hi
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bandi ta shAnta garbhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba smri ti dznyA na k'i rtis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.author: paN+Di ta shAn+ta gar+b+ha
item.translator-pandita: lo tsA ba smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rti

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti gu h+ya sA d+ha na pra dI pa nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma slob dpon chen po pra dznyA gu rus mdzad pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma
item.author: slob dpon chen po pra dz+nyA gu ru

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sang+gi ti tsakra kra maH
item.coloph: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/ bla ma dam pa'i cho ga chen po'i gzhung rnams las/ /blo zhan pa'i don du mos pa tsam las 'jug pa 'di dag gi rim pa phra mo rdzogs so/ /
item.coltitle: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/_bla ma dam pa'i cho ga chen po'i gzhung rnams las/_/blo zhan pa'i don du mos pa tsam las 'jug pa 'di dag gi rim pa phra mo

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI maN+Dal bi d+ti tsin+tA ma Ni nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rigs bsdus pa dang phye ba'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon zla bzangs grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta ma hA dznyA na dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rigs bsdus pa dang phye ba'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon zla bzangs grags pa
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nu
item.translator-pandita: kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA na

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha ni nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs au rgyan gyi slob dpon shrI aa wa dh'u t'i pa chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharmA shrI mi hra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs
item.author: u rgyan gyi slob dpon shrI a wa d+hU tI pa chen po
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti no pi ka
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI maN+Dal bi d+hi kri ta
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon gnyis su med pa spas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shrI mi tra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor kyi cho ga ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon gnyis su med pa sbas pa
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi tra
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu shrI tat+ta sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon gnyis su med pa sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: de kho na nyid kyi sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon gnyis su med pa sbas pa
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor byas pa
item.skttrans: ho ma bi d+hi piN+Di ta
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sbyin sreg slob dpon mya ngan med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon mya ngan med pa'i dpal ba

item.tib: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu sh+ya di bud+d+ha nA ma sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: slob dpon a wa d+hu tis mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po a wa d+hU tI
item.translator-pandita: d+harma shrI mi tra
item.translator: lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: mchod rten gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa
item.skttrans: tsi t+yo sA d+ha na bi d+hi paN+Di ta
item.coloph: a ba d+hu tis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.author: a wa d+hU tI

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a shwa shrI ri / lo tsA ba A zha rgya gar brtsegs gyis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs
item.author: mya ngan med pa'i dpal
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a shwo ka shrI
item.translator: lo tsA ba 'a zha rgya gar brtsegs

item.tib: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra b+hai ra ba sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon a sho ka shrIsa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon a shwa ka shrI
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra
item.translator: lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ya mA ri kA la sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: gshin rje'i gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon a sho ka shrIsa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta d+harmA shrI mi tra dang lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon a shwa ka shrI
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra
item.translator: lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsa la sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: mi g.yo ba'i bsgrub thabs/ /slob dpon a sho ka shrI mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta d+harmA shrI ma ti dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon a sho ka shrI
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra
item.translator: lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: gtor ma'i cho ga
item.skttrans: ba li bi d+hiH
item.coloph: 'jam pa'i mgon po'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'jam dpal mgon po'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyod lam gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI tsar+ya marga bi d+hiH
item.coloph: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a shwa ka shrI mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /shAkya dge slong chos kyi bzang pos dro mo d+ha ra dang nye ba'i rtsar zhus te bsgyur ba'o
item.author: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a sho ka shrI
item.translator: shAkya'i dge slong chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: 'jam dpal rdo rje'i bum pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: badzra many+dzu shrI g+ha tra bi d+hiH
item.coloph: dpal 'jam pa'i mgon po'i bum pa'i cho ga /slob dpon chen po mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dpal u rgyan gyi mkhan po chen po d+harmA shrI mi tra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bod kyi shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyis bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: dpal 'jam dpal mgon po'i bum pa'i cho ga
item.author: slob dpon chen po mya ngan med pa'i dpal
item.translator-pandita: dpal u rgyan gyi mkhan po chen po d+harma shrI mi tra
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bod kyi shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi bzang po

item.tib: ye shes sems dpa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: dz+nyA na satwa sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.author: slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i sbas pa

item.tib: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha nAM
item.coloph: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon mi g.yo seng+gesa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /mar pa do pas bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon mi g.yo seng ge
item.translator: mar pa do pa

item.tib: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha naM nA ma
item.coloph: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa chen po pra b+ha ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dge slong gzhon rin chen gyi don du dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: mkhas pa chen po pra b+hA ka ra
item.translator: lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po
item.translationplace: dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang

item.tib: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha nAM
item.coloph: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /dar ma grags kyis rang 'gyur byas
item.coltitle: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs
item.translator: dar ma grags

item.tib: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klog pa'i man ngag
item.skttrans: nA ma saM gI ti bA tsa no ba de shaM
item.coloph: mtshan brjod klog pa'i man ngag kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: mtshan brjod klog pa'i man ngag
item.author: kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra

item.tib: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: bi sha ti A kA ra b+hi bo bye kra ma na b+ha ga bAn many+dzu shrI sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal ldan so ma shrIsa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur
item.coltitle: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: dpal ldan so ma shrI
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na
item.translator: lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'od

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon so ma shrIsa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kyi rim pa las/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon so ma shrI
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA na
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Da lo bi ka
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon so ma shrIsa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na dang /lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon so ma shrI
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sarba maN+Dal sto tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa/ slob dpon so ma shrI mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa
item.author: slob dpon so ma shrI
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od

item.tib: gtor ma'i cho ga
item.skttrans: ba liM baM d+hiH
item.coloph: gtor ma rdzogs so
item.coltitle: gtor ma'i cho ga

item.tib: dpal thams cad gsang ba'i bshad sbyar gsang ba'i sgron ma
item.skttrans: shrI sarba ra ha s+ya ni ban+d+ha ra ha pra dI po nA ma
item.coloph: dpal thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi bshad sbyar gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po padz+nya ka ra varma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing zhus te gton la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: dpal thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi bshad sbyar gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA ka ra warma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: ngan song sbyong ba'i don gyi 'bru 'grel zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: durga ti pa ri sho d+ha nAr+tha bArti kA nA ma
item.coloph: don gyi 'bru 'grel slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: don gyi 'bru 'grel
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba

item.tib: 'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ne te dzo rA dzA nA ma kalpa rA dza s+ya TI kA
item.coloph: 'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ snying po rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba/ dza laM d+ha ra'i rdo rje slob dpon/ ka ma d+he nu ba zhes bya ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /A tsaR+Ya bi na ya tsan+d+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis/ 'phan yul rgyal gyi lug lhas (slas)su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba/_cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa/_snying po rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba
item.author: dzA lan+d+ha ra'i rdo rje slob dpon/_kA ma d+he nu pa
item.translator-pandita: A tsAr+ya bi na ya tsan+d+ra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab
item.translationplace: 'phan yul rgyal gyi lug lhas

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnam par bshad pa mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: b+ha ga ba ti sarba du rga ti pa ri shod+ha ni te dzo rA dza ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samya k+saM bud+d+hA ya mahA ta n+d+ra rA dza byA khya sun+da rA a lang+kA ra nA ma
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i 'grel ba mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rdo rje go chas mdzod pa rdzogs so/ /'grel ba 'di yi tshad gyur pa/ tshig su bcad pa drug stong dang / bcu bzhi dag ni yod pa ste/ yi ge mkhan la phan phyir ro/ dpal ldan ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgya cher 'grel ba 'di dpyad zlar ba'i yar gyi ngo'i gza' phur bu skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par mchog gis rje btsun rgyal po chen po mchog gi dbang phyug dpal lha 'od zer go cha yis/ mdzad pa'i dpal rgyal po'i lha khang du shAkya'i dge slong rin chen 'byung gnas bzang po rang gis lag pas bris te/ lo lnga brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga lon no
item.coltitle: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i 'grel pa mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po rdo rje go cha'i slob ma kun dga' snying po
item.translationplace: mchog gi rje btsun rgyal po chen po dpal gyi dbang phyug 'od zer go cha'i lha khang

item.tib: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po brtag pa snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ne te dzo rA dza kalpa A lo kA laM ka ra nA ma
item.coloph: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjed kyi rgyal po brtag pa snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bid+ya ka ra varma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dbang phyug rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don
item.skttrans: bai ro tsa na a b+hi sam+bo d+hi tan+t+ra piN+DAr+tha
item.coloph: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don/_slob dpon shrI bud+d+ha gu h+yas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don
item.author: slob dpon shrI bud+d+ha gu h+ya
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta

item.tib: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud chen po'i 'grel bshad
item.coloph: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyud chen po slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas phyin ci ma log par bshad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyud chen po
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba

item.tib: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi tshig 'grel zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: bai ro tsa nA b+hi saM bo d+hi tan+t+ra sad br-it+ti nA ma
item.coloph: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa'i rgyud chen po slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas phyin ci ma log par bshad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa'i rgyud chen po
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba
item.translator: skad gnyis smra ba'i dbang po ska ba dpal brtsegs
item.translationplace: dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang
item.revisionplace: dpal rtse thang gtsug lag khang

item.tib: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par byang chub par gtogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga
item.skttrans: ma hA bai ro tsa na a b+hi saM bod+hi saM bo d+ha pU dza bi d+hiH
item.coloph: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par byang chub pa dang 'brel pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal bzang rab dgas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par byang chub pa dang 'brel pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga
item.author: slob dpon dpal bzang rab dga'
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga
item.coloph: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga_/slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'od kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon rgyal ba'i 'od

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi sgrub thabs dang las kun gyi gter zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: A R+Ya many+dzu shrI gu h+ya tan+t+ra sarba karma sA d+ha nI d+hi nA ma TI kA
item.coloph: slob dpon lha spas kyis mdzad pa sgrub thabs kun gyi gter zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: slob dpon lha spas kyis mdzad pa sgrub thabs kun gyi gter zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rig pa gzhon nu

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.skttrans: AR+Ya many+dzu shrI gu h+ya tan+t+ra s+ya maN+Da la bi d+hiH
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga_/slob dpon don yod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon don yod pa'i zhabs

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
item.skttrans: b+ha ga wAM many+dzu shrI g+ho Sha s+ya kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka ho ma bi d+hiH
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim pa dang /_dngos grub kyi tshul nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon don yod zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim pa dang /_dngos grub kyi tshul nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon don yod zhabs

item.tib: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa
item.skttrans: kro d+ha bi dza ya kalpa gu h+ya tan+t+ra s+ya TI kA

item.tib: bsam gtan phyi ma rim par phye ba rgya cher bshad pa
item.skttrans: d+h+yA not+ta ra pa Ta la TI kA
item.coloph: bsam gtan phyi ma zhes bya ba/ rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: bsam gtan phyi ma zhes bya ba rgya cher bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+hA
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs

item.tib: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su bA hu pa ri pr-i ts+tsha nA ma tan+t+ra piN+DAr+tha
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don
item.author: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba

item.tib: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud kyi tshig gi don bshad pa'i brjed byang
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i rgyud tshig gi don bshad pa'i brjed byang rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud kyi tshig gi don bshad pa'i brjed byang

item.tib: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don dgrol ba'i brjed byang
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su bA hu pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma tan+t+ra piN+DAr+tha pi ti
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i rgyud tshig gi don bshad pa'i brjed byang rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don bkrol ba'i brjed byang

item.tib: dpa' bo gcig tu sgrub pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: sid+d+hai ka bI ra tan+t+ra TI kA
item.coloph: dpa' bo gcig sgrub pa'i 'grel pa gtsug lag khang dza gad+da lI lan gyi su b+hA ka ra zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: dpa' po gcig tu sgrub pa'i 'grel pa
item.author: su b+hA ka ra
item.translator: paN+Di ta dA na shI la
item.revisor: bod kyi ban+de rnams

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni bi d+hi rnA ma d+hA ra Ni TI kA
item.coloph: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon klu grub kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA dang bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng+ge shrI na len+t+ra'i sgo 'gram du bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon klu grub
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhas pa dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ge
item.translationplace: shrI na len+d+ra'i sgo 'gram

item.tib: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi gzungs kyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya nI lA mA ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni d+hA ra NI bi br-i t+ti nA ma
item.coloph: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi 'grel pa/ rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas pa'i paN+Di ta chen po karma badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi 'grel pa
item.author: rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas pa'i paN+Di ta chen po karma badzra

item.tib: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI b+hU ta Da ma ra maN+Dal bid+hi nA ma
item.coloph: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so//_//slob dpon chen po blo bzangs skyong gis mdzad pa'o
item.coltitle: dpal 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon chen po blo bzangs skyong
item.translator-pandita: non ni paN+Di ta
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba u rgyan pa rin chen dpal
item.translationplace: ri bo chen po sbu tra'i mgul

item.tib: rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi bshad pa
item.skttrans: badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni TI kA
item.coloph: slob dpon bo d+hi sa twas mdzad pa'i 'grel pa phyi ma rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa
item.coltitle: 'grel pa phyi ma
item.author: slob dpon bo d+hi sa twa
item.translator: lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra bi dA ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni byA khyA na badzrA lo ka nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje rnam par 'jom pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa/ rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba/ gsang sngags mtha' dag la mnga' brnyes pa'i/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi mdzad pa'o
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba
item.author: gsang sngags mtha' dag la mnga' brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa rin po che gsal ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra NI TI kA rat+na b+ha swa ra nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i 'grel pa rin po che gsal ba zhes bya ba/ bya ba'i rgyud kyi grub pa sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /mkhan po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba dpa' many+dzu shrI varmasa bsgyur ba'o/ phyis paN+Di ta jon+te ta du la dang / lo tsA ba 'og bsod nam mos pa bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i 'grel pa rin po che gsal ba zhes bya ba
item.author: bya ba'i rgyud kyi grub pa sangs rgyas gsang ba
item.translator-pandita: bya ba'i rgyud kyi grub pa sangs rgyas gsang ba
item.translator: lo tsA ba dbas many+dzu shrI warma
item.translator2: lo tsA ba 'og bsod nams mos pa

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni TI kA
item.coloph: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i don rnam par phye ste bshad pa/ rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i don rnam par phye ste bshad pa
item.author: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po ba'i ma la mi tra

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni byA khyA na br-it+ti TI kA
item.coloph: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi don rnam par bshad pa rgya cher 'grel pa/ bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi don rnam par bshad pa rgya cher 'grel pa
item.author: bI ma la mi tra

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: badz+ra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni br-it+ti
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po rdo rje go cha
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: badz+ra bi dA rA Na nA ma d+ma ra Ni byA ka khyu na
item.coloph: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi don rnam par bshad pa/ slob dpon bde ba'i myu gus mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi don rnam par bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon bde ba'i myu gu

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa
item.skttrans: badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni br-iti
item.coloph: rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi 'grel pa jo bo smri tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po de nyid kyis sgyur/ phyi dang nang de kho na nyid kyi khrus gsum ni theg pa gsum dang ji bzhin du sgyur ro
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi 'grel pa
item.author: jo bo smr-i ti
item.translator-pandita: jo bo smr-i ti

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi man ngag
item.skttrans: badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni u pa de sha
item.coloph: sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa dang zhi ba dang bsrung ba ste/ las gsum dang 'brel ba'i zhi ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi rnam par dbye ba rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i man ngag
item.author: paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni rat+na mA la br-it+ti nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i 'grel pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po sa ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de pa puN+ye ma ti dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon chen po sa wa ri pa
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta de ba pu N+ya ma ti
item.translator: lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang po

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba'i rgya cher 'grel ba gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: badzra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+hA ra Ni phaT la kra ma b+hA Sha br-it+ti pra dI paM nA ma
item.coloph: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba/ rgya cher 'grel pa gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag /rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po theg pa chen po gsang sngags la mkhas pa/ slob dpon bud+d+ha gu h+ya dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ska ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po/ shrad+d+ha ka varma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa chen po rin chen bzang pos rgya dpe dang gtugs nas bcos so/ /rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba rgya cher 'grel pa gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon ye shes rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po theg pa chen po gsang sngags la mkhas pa slob dpon bud+d+ha gu h+ya
item.translator: bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ska ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta
item.revisor-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma
item.revisor: bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa chen po rin chen bzang po

item.tib: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: sa man+ta mu kha pra be sha rasmi bi ma loSh+NI Sha pra b+hA sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki te nA ma d+hA ra Ni saM br-it+ti
item.coloph: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa/ slob dpon dngos grub thob pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa dzogs so/ /gsang sngags rig 'dzin sde snod la/ mkha' ltar shes rab dang ba ni/ nyi ma lta bur ma mongs pa'i/ mkhas pa dza la de ba la/ langs ban+de tshul brtsegs kyis/ gus bcas mang du gsol btab nas/ spu rgyal bod las khyad par du/ nad med sa gsang mdo khams su/ yid bzhin nor 'dra'i gzungs mchog gi /'grel pa dpag bsam shing 'dra 'di/ bsgyur ba'i dge bas dad ldan rnams/ gzungs 'di rgya cher spyod par shog /paN+Di ta dza yaM de ba dang / lo tsA ba langs ban+de tshul khrims brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang /_dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po dngos grub thob pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta dza ya de ba
item.translator: lo tsA ba lang so ban+de tshul khrims brtsegs

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.skttrans: sarba ta thA ga taSh+NA Sha b+hA bsi tA ta pa tre nA ma br-i t+ti
item.coloph: 'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdug dkar mo can gzhan gyi mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa slob dpon shU raM ga bor ma badz+rasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur
item.coltitle: 'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa chen mo zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
item.author: slob dpon shU raM ga warma badzra
item.translator: zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab

item.tib: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel lo
item.skttrans: ma hA sA ha sra pra marda ni sa ta sU tra TI kA
item.coloph: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'grel pa/_las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i 'grel pa
item.author: las kyi rdo rje

item.tib: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA ma yu ri bid+yA rA dz+nyI sU tra ta TI kA nA ma
item.coloph: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i 'bum 'grel/_rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i 'bum 'grel
item.author: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po a mo g+ha badzra

item.tib: gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel
item.skttrans: ma hA man+t+rA nu d+hA ra ni shU trAM ti sa ha ra Sha TI kA
item.coloph: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i mdo'i 'bum 'grel
item.author: slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rje
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po mi mnyam rdo rje'i sras/_paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje
item.translationplace: jo mo sgrol mas zhabs kyis bcags pa/_tshangs pa'i 'byung gnas rdo lung dgon pa

item.tib: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA shI ta ba ti bi d+yA rA dza sU trAM ti sa ha ra Sha TI kA nA ma
item.coloph: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel/_slob dpon mkhas pa chen po las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po las kyi rdo rje
item.translator: lha gcig khyad par 'phags pa lha lcam dar sgron
item.translationplace: bkra shis pho brang rdo lung dgon pa

item.tib: 'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mu kha Sha Ta d+hA ra Ni byA khya ta
item.coloph: 'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa/ slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa
item.author: slob dpon dbyig gnyen

item.tib: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a nan+ta mu kha nir+hA ra d+hA ri NI byA khyA naM kA ri kA
item.coloph: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA varma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs rnam par bshad pa tshig le'ur byas pa
item.author: slob dpon ye shes snying po
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pa

item.tib: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi rgya cher 'grel pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a nan+ta mu kha nir+ha ra d+hA ra Ni TI kA
item.coloph: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs rgya cher 'grel pa/ slob dpon ye shes snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA varma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de yes shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs rgya cher 'grel pa
item.author: slob dpon ye shes snying po
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pa

item.tib: dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge brgya pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: tri sa ma ya byU ha rA dza sha ta a/_/ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: dam tshigs gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge brgya pa sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po ke d+ha ra Na d+hisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal go mi 'chi med dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge brgya pa sgrub pa'i thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po ke d+ha ra Na d+hi
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal go mi 'chi med
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab

item.tib: tshe dpag med la bstod pa
item.skttrans: a pa ri mi tA yu raM sto tra
item.coloph: byang chub sems dpa' dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa'o/ 'di'i rgyud pa ni tshe dpag med/ grub pa brnyes pa'i snying po zhabs/ dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal ba/ rdo rje gdan pa che chung gnyis/ pa ri lo tsA ba/ mchims brtson 'grus seng ge /rgya nag phug pa/ dbus pa sangs rgyas 'du ma/ bla ma dge bsdings pa/ bla ma bsam gtan bzang po'o
item.author: byang chub sems dpa' dze tA ri dgra las rnam par rgyal ba

item.tib: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya A yur+dz+nyA nA pa ri mi ta sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mkhas pa dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta/ 'jam dpa'i dbyangs dang / lo tsA ba lce dga' dpal gyi bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon mkhas pa dzai tA ri dgra las rnam par rgyal ba
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta 'jam pa'i dbyangs
item.translator: lo tsA ba lce dga' ba'i dpal

item.tib: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: a pa ri mi tA A yur+dz+nyA na bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: slob dpon dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal pas/ bram ze nam mkha' dbyangs kyi bu'i ched du mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI many+dzu dang lo tsA ba lce dga' ba'i dpal gyis bsgyur pa'o
item.author: slob dpon dzai tA ri dgra las rnam par rgyal ba
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI many+dzu
item.translator: lo tsA ba lce dga' ba'i dpal

item.tib: 'jam dpal rdo rje blo gros 'phel ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: many+dzu shrI badzra pradz+nyA bar+d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: 'jam dpal rdo rje blo gros 'phel zhes bya ba kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'jam dpal rdo rje blo gros 'phel ba zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon klu sgrub

item.tib: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: sid d+hai ka bI ra many+dzu g+ho Sha sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slon dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kar shrI dz+nyA na
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros

item.tib: 'jam dbyangs smra ba'i seng ge'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rje btsun dam pa rgya gar gyi gdams pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rje btsun dam pa rgya gar gyi gdams pa

item.tib: rje btsun 'jam dpal shes rab 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: many+dzu shrI b+haT+Ta rA ka sA d+ha naM pradz+nyA tsakra
item.coloph: rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs shes rab 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po tsan+d+rA ka ra gup+tasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang phyes pa dpal gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs shes rab 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po tsan+d+rA ka ra gup+ta
item.translator-pandita: paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra
item.translator: byams pa dpal

item.tib: 'jam dpal g.yo ba'i 'khor lo
item.skttrans: many+dzu shrI tsa la tsa kra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal g.yo ba'i 'khor lo'i man ngag /kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal g.yo ba'i 'khor lo'i man ngag
item.author: kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dra

item.tib: ngag gi dbang phyug la bstod pa
item.skttrans: bA gI shwa ra sto tra
item.coloph: ngag gi dbang phyug la bu mo brgyad kyis stod pa rdzogs so//
item.coltitle: ngag gi dbang phyug la bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sto tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la khye'u bcu drug gis bstod pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la khye'u bcu drug gis bstod pa

item.tib: 'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug la bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bA gI shwa ra sto traM
item.coloph: 'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug gtso 'khor lnga pa'i bstod pa/ paN+Di ta thig le bum pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug gtso 'khor lnga pa'i bstod pa
item.author: paN+Di ta thig le bum pa

item.tib: gur kum gzhon nu lta bu'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: na pa kuM ku ma sta ba
item.coloph: gur kum gzhon nu lta bu bstod pa/ slob dpon seng ge mi g.yo bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: gur gum gzhon nu lta bu'i bstod pa
item.author: slob dpon seng ge mi g.yo ba
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa byin rlabs dang bcas pa
item.skttrans: b+hag bAn Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sA d+hiSh+ThA na stu ti
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa byin rlabs dang bcas pa snyan ngags mkhan rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po su ma ti kIrti'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab dang / mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa byin rlabs dang bcas pa
item.author: snyan dngags mkhan rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mi
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po su ma ti kI rti
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab
mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug

item.tib: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: shrI dz+nyA na ku Na pha la nA ma stu tiH
item.coloph: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon rdo rje mtshon chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rdog lo tsA ba'i bsgyur
item.coltitle: dpal ye shes yon tan bzang po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa
item.author: slob dpon rdo rje mtshon cha
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pa
item.translator: bod kyi rngog lo tsA ba

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu g+hoSha sto tra
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa/ rtog go ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon phyogs kyi glad pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shra d+d+hA ka ra varma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa
item.author: rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra warma
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po

item.tib: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga
item.skttrans: a ra pa tsa na sA d+ha na bi d+hiH
item.coloph: a ra pa rtsa na'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga /slob dpon shrad+d+hA ka ra varmasa mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga
item.author: slob dpon shad+d+hA ka ra war+m+ma

item.tib: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: a ra pa tsa na sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs/ dngos grub brnyes pa'isloba dpon mi 'pham pa'i bshes gnyen gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bo b+hu ti tsan+d+ra dang / chag lo tsA ba dge lasonga chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs
item.author: dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon mi pham pa'i bshes gnyen
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra
item.translator: chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal

item.tib: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: a ra pa tsa na sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs
item.author: slob dpon chen po mi pham bshes gnyen
item.translator: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sde
item.translationplace: dpal gnod gnas kyi gtsug lag chen po

item.tib: 'jam dbyangs dkar po mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shukla many+dzu g+ho Sha pU dza bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: 'jam dbyangs dkar po a ra pa tsa na mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'jam dbyangs dkar po a ra pa tsa na mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon mi pham bshes gnyen
item.translator: chos 'khor lo tsA ba
item.revisor: dge slong rgya mtsho

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po ma tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga tA la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shrI la bod yul gyi dbus dang srong srin po'i rar lha'i skad las bod kyi brdar 'khrul pa med par bsgyur ba'o
item.author: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po ma ti
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga tA la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI la
item.translationplace: bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po'i ri

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sto tra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal ldan mkhas pa rnams kyi nang nas rgyal mtshan rtse mo ltar shin tu mtho zhing gsal bar gyur pa'i paN+Di ta chen po ma tis 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs dang bstun te/_bskyed pa'i rim pa'i gsal 'debs bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bstod pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs dang bstun te/_bskyed pa'i rim pa'i gsal 'debs bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bstod pa
item.author: paN+Di ta chen po ma ti
item.translator-pandita: pa N+Di ta shA kya shrI b+ha dra
item.translator: bod kyi lo rtsA khro phu ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal
item.translationplace: srin po'i ri

item.tib: 'phags pa a ra pa tsa na'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a ra pa tsa na pU dza bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa a ra pa tsa na'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /lung du ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi skad cung zad rtogs pa'i/ shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po/ grub pa'i zhing dam pa mang yul skye grong 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang las/ cung zad mi rang pa'i chon po rnams kyi gdan sa/ dpal shes rab kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa a ra pa tsa na'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.translator: shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po
item.translationplace: grub pa'i zhing dam pa mang yul skyid grong 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang las/_cung zad mi ring ba'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa/_dpal sher gyi gtsug lag khang

item.tib: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha pany+tsa de ba sto tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i lha lnga'i bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mi mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa
item.author: slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mi

item.tib: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha maN+Da la de wa ga NaM sto tra bi ma la pra b+hA nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtogs kyi sgo nas bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba

item.tib: 'jig rten mgon po'i bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pA pa bi dA ra Na ma na ha ra na nA ma lo ka nA tha sto tra
item.coloph: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba/ shar phyogs ba reN+Di'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs ba raN+Di'i dzA ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shrI las bsgyur ba
item.coltitle: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba
item.author: shar phyogs ba ren Da'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsan+d+ra go mi
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar shar phyogs ba ren Da'i dzA ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI la

item.tib: thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba
item.skttrans: ma hA kA ru NI ka sto tra tso da naM
item.coloph: thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba nyer bzhi pa/ dge brnyen chen po zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pa ra me shwa ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
item.coltitle: thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba nyer bzhi pa
item.author: dge bsnyen chen po zla ba
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po par me shwa ra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas

item.tib: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: lo ke shwa ra sto tra nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la/tsaR+Ya Di pa zhabs kyis bstod pa rdzogs so/ /sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba snyan gyi zhal snga nas/ lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la/_tsar+ya dI pa zhabs kyis bstod pa
item.translator-pandita: sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba'i snyan
item.translator: lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po

item.tib: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha pany+tsa de ba sto tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/ paN+Di ta chen po e ra pa tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa
item.author: paN+Di ta chen po e rab ti
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje
item.translator: lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags pa

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tsar+p+pa Tis bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya tsar+p+pa Ti ru tsi ta sto traM
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstod pa grub thob chen po tsarba pa Tisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa
item.author: grub thob chen po tsar+p+pa Ti
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin chen
item.translator: lo tsA ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal

item.tib: dpal 'jig rten mgon po mkha' la spyod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI khaR+sa pA Na lo ka nA tha sA d+ha na nA ma
item.coloph: dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po khar+sa pA Na'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba grub chen pad+ma 'byung gnas zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po khar+sa pA Na'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
item.author: grub chen pad+ma 'byung gnas zhabs
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+na
item.translator: chos 'khor lo tsA ba
item.revisor: btsun pa rgya mtsho

item.tib: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa
item.skttrans: lo ke shwa ra sha ta ka sto tra
item.coloph: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa/ snyan ngag mkhan chen po shrI badz+ra de ba zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas spras pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po dang / mi'i dbang po dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan ngag mkhan chen po ma hA paN+Di ta lak+Sh+mi ka ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston gyis bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa
item.author: snyan ngag mkhan chen po shrI badzra de ba
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan ngag mkhan po ma hA paN+Di ta la k+sh+mI ka ra
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston

item.tib: 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa
item.skttrans: lo ke shwa rA ya sto tra
item.coloph: 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa/ dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.author: dge slong ma dpal mo

item.tib: nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga la bstod pa
item.skttrans: ma Ni dwI pa ma hA kA ru Ni ka de ba pany+tsa sto tra
item.coloph: nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i bstod pa/_/slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i bstod pa
item.author: slob dpon rta dbyangs

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya sto tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod pa/_slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod pa
item.author: slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi

item.tib: thugs rje chen po la smre sngags kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku bAkya sto tra nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/_slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis bstod pa smre sngags su gsol ba rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/_slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis bstod pa smre sngags su gsol ba
item.author: slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi

item.tib: thugs rje chen po la smre sngags kyis bstod pa byin rlabs can zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku bAkya sto trA d+hiti Sh+ThA ta nA ma
item.coloph: slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.author: slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pa

item.note: The text doesn't contain a title, it is constituted of a prayer and 3 mantras.

item.tib: snying rje la bstod pa
item.skttrans: kA ru Na sto tra
item.coloph: snying rje la bstod pa dge bsnyen kun sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: snying rje la bstod pa
item.author: dge bsnyen kun sbyin

item.tib: dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI AR+yA ba lo ke te shwa ra s+ya stu ti nA ma
item.coloph: dge slong ma zla mdzes kyis bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.author: dge slong ma zla mdzes
item.translator: dge slong bsod nams rnam rgyal

item.tib: spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po mchog la bstod pa
item.coltitle: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bus bstod pa
item.translator: bsod nams rnam par rgyal ba

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: AR+yA ba lo ke te shwa ras ha sra b+hu dza sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub bdag nyid chen po mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rjer ldan pa sa drug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin yang sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa/_dper na nga'i nye gnas kun dga' bo sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yin yang so so'i skye bor byin gyis brlabs pa lta bu'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gshegs te/_sa brgyad pa la gnas nas lus gnyis su byas te/_gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la mchod pa byed/_gcig ni dga' ldan du byams pa la mdo 'di nyid kyi don 'dri'o zhes gsungs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'o ces bya bar lung bstan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Dita chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na
item.translator: zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang po

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: Ar+yA ba lo ke te shwa ra Sha Ta k+Sha ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: thugs rje chen po'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: thugs rje chen po'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba
item.author: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon pad+ma
item.translator: bod kyi lo tsA ba btsun pa rgyal ba mchog dbyangs

item.tib: rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
item.skttrans: b+haT+TA rA ka A R+yA ba lo ke te shwa re ka da sha mu kha s+ya sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/_dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
item.author: dge slong ma dpal mo
item.translator-pandita: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na
item.translator: lo tsA ba rin chen bzang po

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa
item.skttrans: AR+yA ba lo ke te shwa ra sto tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/_dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa
item.author: dge slong ma dpal mo

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstod pa
item.skttrans: Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra sto tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstod pa/_dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstod pa
item.author: dge slong ma dpal mo

item.tib: rje btsun thugs rje chen po la bstod pa
item.skttrans: b+haT+wA rA ka ma hA kA ru Ni ka sto tra
item.coloph: rje btsun thugs rje chen po la bstod pa dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzags so
item.coltitle: rje bcun thugs rje chen po la bstod pa
item.author: dge slong ma dpal mo

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.skttrans: aSh+Tot+ta rA sa ta AR+yA ba lo ke te shwa ra sA d+ha naM
item.coloph: thugs rje chen go bad+sa pA Na'i sgrub thabs tshigs su bcas pa bzhi pa rdzogs so
item.coltitle: thugs rje chen go bad+sa pA Na'i sgrub thabs tshigs su bcas pa bzhi pa

item.tib: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ge sgrub thabs rdzogs so
item.coltitle: rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ge sgrub thabs

item.tib: thugs rje chen po ye shes sems dpa'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: thugs rje chen po kha sarba N-i'i sgrub thabs tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon a dzi ta mi tra gup+tasa mdzad/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI dza ta mi tra nan+ta zhal snga nas dang/ kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: thugs rje chen po ye shes sems dpa'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: spyan ras gzigs 'khor lo gsum sgom pa
item.coloph: spyan ras gzigs 'khor lo gsum bsgom pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon a dzi ta mi tra gup+tasa mdzad/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI dza ta mi tra nan+ta zhal snga nas dang/ kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: spyan ras gzigs 'khor lo gsum bsgom pa

item.tib: thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /slob dpon a dzi ta mi tra gup+tasa mdzad/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI dza ta mi tra nan+ta zhal snga nas dang/ kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
item.coltitle: thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs

item.tib: dpal 'jig rten mgon po tshad med bzhi'i sgrub thabs

item.coloph: stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so/ /slob dpon a dzi ta mi tra gup+tasa mdzad/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI dza ta mi tra nan+ta zhal snga nas dang/ kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.coloph: dpal lha'i grong khyer du 'jug pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon a dzi ta mi tra gup+tasa mdzad/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI dza ta mi tra nan+ta zhal snga nas dang/ kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

item.coltitle: rdo rje skar mda'i man ngag

item.coltitle: tshe 'das pa la bya ba'i cho ga

item.coltitle: ro bsreg gi cho ga

item.tib: sbyin sreg gi cho ga
